content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your interest, Mister Wang. I am sure you will find the apartment to your liking. How much are you considering to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for a good place to live. I believe that the apartment is a good fit for me. However, I am on a tight budget. Therefore, I would like to offer you 450 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 450 Euros per month is much lower than my expectations. The location of the apartment and its amenities command a higher price. How about we start with a more reasonable offer? What is the maximum you are willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I understand your point. Considering the location and amenities of the apartment, I am willing to offer 500 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your offer, but I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay the fair market value for this apartment. The going rate for similar apartments in the area is around 600 Euros per month. Are you able to meet this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the market price is 600 Euros per month. However, I am a student and have a limited budget. Therefore, I am not able to pay that amount. I am willing to pay 525 Euros per month which is closer to the market price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but 525 Euros per month is still below the market rate. I need to find a tenant who is willing to pay the full market value to cover the costs of the apartment. If you are unable to meet the market price, I may have to consider other options.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your concern. I am willing to pay 550 Euros per month, which is quite close to the market price. I believe this is a fair offer, considering I am a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 550 Euros per month is more in line with the market rate, but it is still slightly below my asking price. I am willing to negotiate a bit further, but I need to ensure that I am getting a fair deal for my property. Would you be willing to pay 575 Euros per month? This would be closer to the market value and would reflect the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay 575 Euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair offer, considering I am a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent, Mister Wang. I am pleased to hear that you are willing to pay 575 Euros per month. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. I agree to the price of 575 Euros! Let's proceed with the rental agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
